SPI_Transaction_t Struct Reference
SPI Driver External Data Structures

A SPI_Transaction data structure is used with SPI_transfer(). It indicates how many SPI_FrameFormat frames are sent and received from the buffers pointed to txBuf and rxBuf. More...

#include <drivers/spi/SPI.h>

Data Fields

Detailed Description

A SPI_Transaction data structure is used with SPI_transfer(). It indicates how many SPI_FrameFormat frames are sent and received from the buffers pointed to txBuf and rxBuf.

Field Documentation

size_t SPI_Transaction_t::count

Number of frames for this transaction

void* SPI_Transaction_t::rxBuf

void * to a buffer to receive data

uint8_t SPI_Transaction_t::slaveIndex

Index of the slave enabled for this transfer

SPI_Status SPI_Transaction_t::status

Status code set by SPI_transfer

void* SPI_Transaction_t::txBuf

void * to a buffer with data to be transmitted
